description: Scrum Master: Increased team productivity by 20% by facilitating Agile transformation and improving communication among cross-functional teams. Successfully onboarded and integrated 2 new team members, and managed the transition when 2 members left. Currently leading the Agile transformation of a new team. Actively participate in SAFe ART and lead the Scrum Master Community of Practice.

Frontend Developer: Maintained and enhanced HMI applications for one of the main business unit using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript. Implemented new features, performed code refactoring, and developed testing frameworks in Cypress to ensure application stability. Leading the migration of a major application to Angular.
Proactive Development: Rewrote and optimized multiple SharePoint pages, enhancing the functionality and user experience of the company's internal systems.
Sharepoint Developer: develop and customize internal websites and applications, contributing to the improvement of internal workflows.
Research and Development: Conducted research on discrete-time approximate models using Python for simulations, applying Agile principles for efficient project management.
Collaboration: Coauthored 3 scientific articles, working in multidisciplinary teams with Scrum-like methodologies to enhance communication and productivity.

Problem-Solving Approach: Led problem-based learning sessions in Statistics, Algebra, and Mathematical Analysis, using real-world engineering data. Facilitated programming with R to analyze data, emphasizing teamwork and practical problem-solving.

Course Development: Developed custom study materials and collaborated on curriculum design, focusing on real-world applications and team-based projects to enhance student engagement and learning outcomes.
Interactive Teaching: Facilitated problem-solving sessions and group work for engineering students, applying Agile-inspired methods to enhance learning and collaboration.
Curriculum Development: Developed and delivered course materials for Mathematical Analysis, fostering an interactive and student-centered learning environment.
